item.title: SSRS Report Server Settings Validation Error- AX 2012 R3 CU9
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Resolve SSRS Report Server settings validation error in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 CU9 by disabling UAC through registry modification. Fix for Web Service URL and Report Manager URL configuration issues.
